sample

Class MoviePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Product
      • sample.MoviePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, MultimediaControl

    public class MoviePlayer
extends Product
implements MultimediaControl
    A movie player. It stores the name, manufacturer, screen, and monitor type that belong to this device (see Screen and MonitorType). In addition to these attributes, it has methods for controlling the movie player's playback (see MultimediaControl interface).
    See Also:
    Screen, MonitorType, MultimediaControl

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MonitorType monitorType
      The monitor type of the movie player.
      private Screen screen
      The Screen object that belongs to the player.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void next()

    • Field Detail

      • screen

        private Screen screen
        The Screen object that belongs to the player. This holds the resolution, refresh rate, and response rate of the visual display screen.
        See Also:
        Screen

      • monitorType

        private MonitorType monitorType
        The monitor type of the movie player.
        See Also:
        MonitorType

            Screen screen,
            MonitorType monitorType)
        The default constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the movie player.
        manufacturer - The manufacturer of the movie player.
        screen - The screen that the movie player has.
        monitorType - The monitor type of the movie screen.
